get.summary: Returns information about a customer's downloaded assets.

parameters.name: Api-Key
parameters.description: Api-Key

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization token required. Used for applying content access restrictions. Use one of the OAuth2 grants to auto-populate this value.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: If specified, select assets downloaded on or before this date. Dates should be submitted in ISO 8601 format (i.e., YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Size of page

parameters.name: product_offering
parameters.description: Specifies product offerings to be included in the previous download results.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: If specified, select assets downloaded on or after this date. Dates should be submitted in ISO 8601 format (i.e., YYYY-MM-DD).

post.description: The single step download call returns either a redirect or a response message with the URI to download the largest image available.rn                Returns HTTP status code 303 Redirect to download URI or HTTP status code 200.

parameters.name: Api-Key
parameters.description: Api-Key

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization token required. Used for applying content access restrictions. Use one of the OAuth2 grants to auto-populate this value.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Specifies the pixel height of the particular image to download.rn                    Available heights can be found in the images/{ids} response for the specific image.rn                    If left blank, it will return the largest available size.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of image to download.

post.description: The single step download call returns either a redirect or a response message with the URI to download the largest video available.rn                Returns HTTP status code 303 Redirect to download URI or HTTP status code 200.

parameters.name: Api-Key
parameters.description: Api-Key

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization token required. Used for applying content access restrictions. Use one of the OAuth2 grants to auto-populate this value.

parameters.name: auto_download
parameters.description: Specifies whether to auto-download the video. If true is specified, a 303 SeeOther status is returned with arn                    Location header set to the location of the video.rn                    If false is specified, the download URI will be returned in the response message.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of video to download.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Specifies the size to be downloaded.

post.description: The single step download call returns either a redirect or a response message with the URI to download the largest image available.rn                Returns HTTP status code 303 Redirect to download URI or HTTP status code 200.

parameters.name: Api-Key
parameters.description: Api-Key

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization token required. Used for applying content access restrictions. Use one of the OAuth2 grants to auto-populate this value.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Specifies the pixel height of the particular image to download.rn                    Available heights can be found in the images/{ids} response for the specific image.rn                    If left blank, it will return the largest available size.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of image to download.
